verse.verse_0: In the name of God, the Gracious, the Merciful.
verse.verse_2: They marveled that a warner has come to them from among them. The disbelievers say, "This is something strange.
verse.verse_3: When we have died and become dust? This is a farfetched return."
verse.verse_4: We know what the earth consumes of them, and with Us is a comprehensive book.
verse.verse_5: But they denied the truth when it has come to them, so they are in a confused state.
verse.verse_6: Have they not observed the sky above them, how We constructed it, and decorated it, and it has no cracks?
verse.verse_7: And the earth, how We spread it out, and set on it mountains, and grew in it all kinds of delightful pairs?
verse.verse_8: A lesson and a reminder for every penitent worshiper.
verse.verse_9: And We brought down from the sky blessed water, and produced with it gardens and grain to harvest.
verse.verse_10: And the soaring palm trees, with clustered dates.
verse.verse_11: As sustenance for the servants. And We revive thereby a dead town. Likewise is the resurrection.
verse.verse_12: Before them the people of Noah denied the truth, and so did the dwellers of Russ, and Thamood.
verse.verse_13: And Aad, and Pharaoh, and the brethren of Lot.
verse.verse_14: And the Dwellers of the Woods, and the people of Tubba. They all rejected the messengers, so My threat came true.
verse.verse_15: Were We fatigued by the first creation? But they are in doubt of a new creation.
verse.verse_16: We created the human being, and We know what his soul whispers to him. We are nearer to him than his jugular vein.
verse.verse_17: As the two receivers receive, seated to the right and to the left.
verse.verse_18: Not a word does he utter, but there is a watcher by him, ready.
verse.verse_19: The daze of death has come in truth: "This is what you tried to evade."
verse.verse_20: And the Trumpet is blown: "This is the Promised Day."
verse.verse_21: And every soul will come forward, accompanied by a driver and a witness.
verse.verse_22: "You were in neglect of this, so We lifted your screen from you, and your vision today is keen."
verse.verse_23: And His escort will say, "This is what I have ready with me."
verse.verse_26: Who fabricated another god with God; toss him into the intense agony."
verse.verse_27: His escort will say, "Our Lord, I did not make him rebel, but he was far astray."
verse.verse_28: He will say, "Do not feud in My presence-I had warned you in advance.
verse.verse_29: The decree from Me will not be changed, and I am not unjust to the servants."
verse.verse_30: On the Day when We will say to Hell, "Are you full?" And it will say, "Are there any more?"
verse.verse_31: And Paradise will be brought closer to the pious, not far away.
verse.verse_32: "This is what you were promised-for every careful penitent.
verse.verse_33: Who inwardly feared the Most Gracious, and came with a repentant heart.
verse.verse_34: Enter it in peace. This is the Day of Eternity."
verse.verse_35: Therein they will have whatever they desire-and We have even more.
verse.verse_36: How many generations before them, who were more powerful than they, did We destroy? They explored the lands-was there any escape?
verse.verse_37: In that is a reminder for whoever possesses a heart, or cares to listen and witness.
verse.verse_38: We created the heavens and the earth and what is between them in six days, and no fatigue touched Us.
verse.verse_39: So endure what they say, and proclaim the praises of your Lord before the rising of the sun, and before sunset.
verse.verse_40: And glorify Him during the night, and at the end of devotions.
verse.verse_41: And listen for the Day when the caller calls from a nearby place.
verse.verse_42: The Day when they will hear the Shout in all truth. That is the Day of Emergence.
verse.verse_43: It is We who control life and death, and to Us is the destination.
verse.verse_44: The Day when the earth will crack for them at once. That is an easy gathering for Us.
verse.verse_45: We are fully aware of what they say, and you are not a dictator over them. So remind by the Quran whoever fears My warning.
